TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enable Polux Tweaks
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: This entire section is disabled by default for compatibility sake mostly, some Polux related tweaks function regardless of if they've been changed (any changing a radius for example) so this allows them all to be skipped over without any potential for conflicts if you prefer another polux tweak mod.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Replantable Polux
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Makes it so you can move Polux trees like any other.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Ignore Artificial Buildings
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Vanilla usually disables the tree's effects if there are artificial buildings in its radius, this disables that behaviour and lets it function anyway.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Effect Radius
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The radius in which the polux tree will cleanse of pollution.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Effect Rate
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: A multiplier on the time between each attempt to cleanse pollution around the tree.
